about.title: An AI algorithm enthusiast and a second-year student in PolyU. My current research interests lie in the pioneering fields of Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs), Computer Vision (CV), and Spatial Intelligence. I am dedicated to bridging the gap between advanced foundation models and complex real-world challenges, exploring the boundaries of AGI.

item1.title: Intelligent Geolocation Recognition System Based on MLLM
item1.description: Addressed pain points in instant retail scenarios by implementing automated address extraction and precision retrieval via Qwen2.5-VL, enhancing delivery efficiency.
points: • Leveraged LoRA & Full-parameter Fine-tuning (DeepSpeed) to achieve 99% OCR accuracy and 98% classification accuracy.
• Integrated Amap API with multi-semantic search, boosting Top-1 retrieval accuracy from 91% to 96%.
• Manually curated a 2% noise dataset, enhancing generalization and reducing misjudgment in edge cases.

item2.title: Content Safety Moderation Platform Powered by MLLM
item2.description: Substituted traditional manual audits with MLLMs for automated multi-scenario violation detection and reasoning, reducing operational costs.
points: • RL Implementation: Utilized the GRPO algorithm to build a hybrid reward model, increasing recall from 70% to 85%.
• Cold Start & Data Engineering: Generated reasoning labels via GPT-4o and built a balanced 15k+ dataset to mitigate sample imbalance.
• Optimization: Adjusted token prediction probabilities to reach a 98% precision rate for mission-critical automation.
